item.title: Hugo Basic Terminal Command Quick Reference
item.description: Check Hugo version In a terminal, enter the command: hugo version If Hugo is installed you should see a message indicating the Hugo version number. Create a new website In a terminal pointed to the directory where you want Hugo project files to reside, enter the command: hugo new site my-hugo-website NOTE: Replace my-hugo-website with the site name you want. You should see a message beginning with Congratulations! Your new Hugo site is created in…
